ygData.subject: off to the battle!
ygData.msgSnippet: *Shadow Cat and Snow Tech stood conceled in the bushes, watching the IR in battle. She looked like she had alot on her shoulders. Snow Tech turned to Shadow

*Shadow Cat and Snow Tech stood conceled in the bushes, watching the IR in 
battle. She looked like she had alot on her shoulders. Snow Tech turned to 
Shadow Cat, cocks an eyebrow and smiles.*

" No, not at all. We are NOT going to screw up anything! NO, we are not 
going to help her. She is quite able to handle herself. Now sit and 
behave!!"

* The threat was quite real and she had the power to back it up. But Snow 
Tech was unable to realize that and looked up at her with big green eyes and 
with a baby voice said:*

" Pweeze?"

* Shadow Cat was ready to hit him, but she contained her anger and wispered 
fiercly to him,*

" Not a magot-ridden chance!"

*Snow Tech hung his head and moped. With his index finger he made swirly 
shapes with his finger. Shadow Cat sighed and looked at him.*

" Why would you wantto?"

* Snow tech replies with the same baby voice.*

" "cause i wanna kiwl someone!"

  *Shadow Cat growls and turns away and mutters.*

" Don't ask me, ask IR!"

*Snow Tech looks up with his eyes a-glow. He smiles and pats her on the back 
and says*

" I knew you'd see it my way!!"

*Then, without warning, he stands up and shouts to Iron Raptor who is across 
the feild,*

" YO! IR!! CAN I HELP? HUH? HUH?"

*Shadow Cat slaps her forehead and mutters, "We're dead!"
